parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort order fieldnames sperated with a comma

Contact.title: Contactpersoon
Contact.row(row): var a = String(row.title).split(' '); a.push('' + a.pop() + ''); row.innerHTML = a.join(' '); //row.findstr = accentsTidy(row.title);

SalesPrice.title: Verkoop prijs
SalesPrice.get(): var srcItem = api.items[this.srcID] || { values: {} } return Number(this.values.cp || srcItem.values.cp) * (100 - Number(this.values.sd || srcItem.values.sd || 0)) / 100

PurchasePrice.title: Inkoop prijs
PurchasePrice.get(): var srcItem = api.items[this.srcID] || { values: {} } return (this.values.cp || srcItem.values.cp) * (100 - Number(this.values.pd || srcItem.values.pd || 0)) / 100
